item.title: ‘Ruth & Boaz’ Trailer: Biblical Characters Fall in Love in Netflix’s Modern Re-Telling Produced by Tyler Perry – Film News in Brief
item.description: The modern-day retelling of the biblical tale from the Book of Ruth is coming to Netflix on Sept. 26, and the streamer has unveiled a first look with the release of its official trailer. Directed by A
